snippet.title: Run Legends Launch Trailer | iOS and Android Fitness Battle Game
snippet.description:
Ready to shake up your fitness routine? Run Legends is a fitness battle game where your movement unleashes attacks and special skills.

Walk or run to defeat the villainous Sappers who are draining humanity’s energy. Upgrade your gear, make new friends, and learn more about the world of Run Legends as you grow stronger in real life!

Run Legends is the first-ever fitness game that you can play synchronously with your friends, no matter where they are in the world. Your movement controls your character: head outside and unleash skills in battle by moving faster and slower.

Run Legends launches May 18, 2023 - follow us for the latest updates!
Download on iOS:  https://apps.apple.com/us/app/run-legends/id1585730648
Download on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.talofagames.abra
Official Website: https://www.talofagames.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/runlegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/talofagames
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@talofagames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/talofagames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TalofaGames
